headline: Don't Let Phantom Power Trick You into Higher Energy Use This Season
summary: Energy vampires. Phantom load. Standby power. All have an eternal thirst for electricity and all can have a sinister impact on monthly energy bills.

raw.headline: Don't Let Phantom Power Trick You into Higher Energy Use This Season

headline: Buy 5 Nuclear Energy Stocks Amid Massive AI-Powered Data Center Growth
summary: AI-driven data center demand is fueling a nuclear energy boom. D, DUK, AEE, ETR and PCG are five stocks poised to benefit from the surge.

headline: PG&E avoids ‘big bets’ as data center demand softens
summary: The company remains focused on improving its credit rating, CEO Patti Poppe said.
